message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. It holds immense value to us, but considering its importance to you, we are offering it at an exceptional price of $1150000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a product worth $1200000 at a competitive rate.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $1100000 for it. I hope this revised offer meets your needs.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. While we understand your budget constraints, we believe there's room for mutual understanding. We are willing to consider your offer, but we would need to adjust the price slightly to $1125000. This still reflects the high value of the product while accommodating your financial situation.
